T01D1113:45a-1: de wa aa ti sha ya sto tra t'i k'a /
T01D1113:45a-3: lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa /

T01D1113:45a-7: lha las phul du byung bar bstod pa ni //

T01D1113:45b-0: bde khyed @45b bdag pos ni lha las phul du
T01D1113:45b-1: byung ba'i bstod pas thub pa'i dbang po la bstod
T01D1113:45b-3: da ni lha las phul du byung ba zhes bya
T01D1113:45b-4: ba'i bstod pa de'i rgya cher bshad pa brtsam par
T01D1113:45b-5: bya ba'i phyir / de'i bshad pa nye bar bstan

T01D1113:45b-14: byed pas de'i phyir rigs pa la brten nas smras
T01D1113:45b-15: pa yin te / sems can las phul du byung
T01D1113:45b-16: ba'i ston pa de ni da ltar mngon sum du
T01D1113:45b-18: rnal 'byor pa'i shes pa yang med pa yin pa'i phyir /
T01D1113:45b-19: mngon sum du ma gyur mod kyi /
T01D1113:45b-20: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pas sa gsum na yang dag par ston pa rnam pa gnyis grags te /

T01D1113:45b-22: rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa la
T01D1113:45b-23: ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston par grags so
T01D1113:45b-24: // de la 'di rnams mngon sum du mthong ba

T01D1113:45b-26: // yin te / thub pa'i dbang po yang mngon sum du ma dmigs la /
T01D1113:45b-27: tshangs pa la sogs pa yang sgrib g-yogs med par ma mthong zhes bya ba'i don to //
T01D1113:45b-28: bcom ldan zhes bya ba ni chags dang bcas pa'i
T01D1113:45b-29: nyon mongs pa'i dgra bo bcom pa'i phyir bcom ldan
T01D1113:45b-30: te ; 'dis ni spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa smras pa yin no //
T01D1113:45b-31: bde gshegs zhes bya 'dis ni don phyin ci ma
T01D1113:45b-32: log par yang dag par thugs su chud pa'i phyir
T01D1113:45b-34: 'dis ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T01D1113:45b-35: khyab 'jug ces bya ba ni rnam par gnon pa sna tshogs pas khyab pa'i phyir khyab 'jug ste /
T01D1113:45b-36: 'dis sa gsum par gnon pa'i phyir de skad ces bya la /
T01D1113:45b-37: de'i lte ba'i pad+ma las tshangs pa skyes la /
T01D1113:45b-38: de nyid las ni 'gro ba gzhan dag kyang skyes so zhes zer ro //
T01D1113:46a-0: lha chen po ni 'gro ba rnams sdud par byed pa yin pas na 'phrogs pa zhes @46a * //
T01D1113:46a-2: 'gro ba 'byin pa dang skyed pa po yin par 'dod de /
T01D1113:46a-3: de ni 'jig rten 'di 'byin par byed cing so
T01D1113:46a-4: sor sdud par yang byed do zhes gtam du grags
T01D1113:46a-5: pa yin no // tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni gser gyi skye gnas te skye dgu'i bdag po'o //
T01D1113:46a-7: dang po chu ni sprul par gyur //
T01D1113:46a-8: der ni sa bon bcug gyur la //
T01D1113:46a-9: de ni gser gyi sgo ngar gyur //
T01D1113:46a-10: de las changs pa skyes pa yin //
T01D1113:46a-12: de la gser gyi rang bzhin can gyi sgo nga
T01D1113:46a-13: las mngal gyi tshul du gyur pa las skyes pa'i
T01D1113:46a-14: phyir gser gyi snying po zhe'am /
T01D1113:46a-15: gser gyi skye gnas zhes bya'o //
T01D1113:46a-16: de ltar na bzhi po de dag ni 'jig rten
T01D1113:46a-17: pa ma lus pa'i mngon sum du ma gyur pa'i
T01D1113:46a-18: phyir lkog tu gyur pa yin la /
T01D1113:46a-19: lkog tu gyur pa'i don rtogs pa ni rjes su dpag pa la brten par bya dgos pas /
T01D1113:46a-20: de'i phyir de dag gi zhes bya ba smos pa yin te /
T01D1113:46a-21: de ltar bzhi po de rnams kyi gzugs de kha dog dang /
T01D1113:46a-22: dbyibs kyi bdag nyid can gyi cha lugs dang /
T01D1113:46a-23: spyod pa ni bya ba'i las te /
T01D1113:46a-25: yon tan ni ting nge 'dzin gyis khyad par can du 'phags pa ste /
T01D1113:46a-26: de dag brtags shing shes par gyis la /
T01D1113:46a-27: kye ma bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs
T01D1113:46a-28: pa rnams ni 'dir gang zhig ni yon tan dang
T01D1113:46a-29: ldan pa yin zhes rnam par brtag gi /
T01D1113:46a-30: phyogs su lhung ba'i sdang ba gang yin pa de
T01D1113:46a-31: bsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsdus pa'i don
T01D1113:46a-32: to // de ni gzugs sna tshogs pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas smras pa ni /
T01D1113:46a-33: khyab 'jug ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T01D1113:46a-34: khyab 'jug 'khor lo thogs pa ni blta na sdug pa la sogs pa'i mtshon cha thogs pa ste /
T01D1113:46a-35: des 'jigs pa ni 'jigs su rung bar khyab 'jug snang ba'o //
T01D1113:46a-37: bdud rtsi phrogs pa las lha dang lha ma yin 'gras par gyur pas rdeg par 'dod pa na /
T01D1113:46a-38: de dag la mtshon cha med pas bsnun par ma nus pa dang /
T01D1113:46a-39: phur bus lha rnams la smras pa /
T01D1113:46a-40: pra tsa zhes bya ba'i drang srong chen po'i bu
T01D1113:46a-41: zho 'thung zhes bya ba lo bye ba phrag bdun
T01D1113:46a-42: gyi bar du dka' thub la gnas par gyur pas
T01D1113:46a-43: / de'i rus pa rdo rjer gyur pa yod de /
T01D1113:46b-0: de'i rus pa blangs nas mtshon char byas nas gsum las rgyal bar nus @46b par 'gyur bas /
T01D1113:46b-1: de slongs la mtshon cha des lha ma yin gzhom pa'i rigs so zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-2: lha rnams kyis drang srong de la gsol ba btab ste bslangs so //
T01D1113:46b-3: des kyang de rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir lus la bldag tu bcug ste /
T01D1113:46b-4: rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas nas de dag la byin no //
T01D1113:46b-5: de nas las thams cad pas rtsib logs kyi rus
T01D1113:46b-6: pa la rdo rje byas pa ni brgya byin gyis
T01D1113:46b-7: khyer ro // byin pa'i rus pa las dbyig par byas pa ni khyab 'jug gis khyer ro //
T01D1113:46b-8: las thams cad pa'i bu mo re nu ka zhes bya ba nyi mas bslangs pa las /
T01D1113:46b-9: de gzi byin bsdus pa'i gzugs can du gyur pas
T01D1113:46b-10: de'i gzi byin ma bzod pas khyo dang lhan cig
T01D1113:46b-11: rol cing rtse bar mi 'dod pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-12: grul bum gyi bu mo dang lha'i bu mo gzhan
T01D1113:46b-13: dag gis kyang nyi ma'i gzi byin bsten par mi
T01D1113:46b-14: nus pas de dag bros te pha'i khyim du zhugs
T01D1113:46b-16: phas spyos pas skyo ba skyes te rgod ma'i gzugs
T01D1113:46b-17: su byas nas ri bo ti se'i ri sul gyi
T01D1113:46b-18: khrod kyi nang du dka' thub spyod cing 'dug go
T01D1113:46b-19: // nyi ma yang chung ma tshol zhing song ba na /
T01D1113:46b-20: gtam de thos nas der song ste /
T01D1113:46b-21: rta'i gzugs su bsgyur nas mnan par gyur pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-22: skyes bu gzhan gyis mngal chags par mi bya'o zhes byas pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-23: nyi mas bgad de rang nyid kyi gzugs bstan nas /
T01D1113:46b-24: nga las bu chags pa yin no zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-25: chung ma'i sna las phyung bas tha skar gyi bu gnyis su gyur to //
T01D1113:46b-26: gtam de las thams cad pas thos pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-28: gal te khyod kyis tshor ba brnag nus na ngas khyod gzugs yid du 'ong bar byas la /
T01D1113:46b-29: gang gi tshe lhag par mi bzod phar na ba
T01D1113:46b-30: de'i tshe ni gtang bar bya'o zhes smras pa dang
T01D1113:46b-31: / des de bzhin du bya'o zhes pa dang /
T01D1113:46b-32: des de sa la bsgyel te /
T01D1113:46b-33: 'khor los cha bcu gnyis su byas nas long mo'i bar du brdar te /
T01D1113:46b-35: de phan chad ni nyi ma rkang pa ma brdar pa zhes bya bar grags so //
T01D1113:46b-36: de nas gzi byin gyis dum bu de dag bsdus nas 'khor lor byas la /
T01D1113:46b-37: de ni shin tu 'bar bas blta na sdug pa zhes bya bar btags so //
T01D1113:46b-38: de brgya byin gyis khyab 'jug la byin la /
T01D1113:47a-0: des kyang gang gi tshe sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bdud rtsi brkus te 'thungs @47a * //
T01D1113:47a-2: khyab 'jug gis 'khor lo des de'i mgo bcad par gyur to //
T01D1113:47a-3: des kyang de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi lus la
T01D1113:47a-4: reg pas shin tu 'bar bar snang bas kyang blta
T01D1113:47a-5: na sdug pa zhes bya bar btags so //
T01D1113:47a-6: lha chen po zhes bya ba ni bde byed de /
T01D1113:47a-7: 'di las bde bar gyur pa'i phyir bde byed ces bya ste /
T01D1113:47a-8: lha chen po las 'jig rten thams cad bde bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T01D1113:47a-9: mi yi thod pa'i phreng ba rnams kyis bzhag / ces bya ba ni /
T01D1113:47a-11: de yang bram ze la gnod pa byas pa'i sdig pa dang bral bas dga' ste /
T01D1113:47a-12: nyin re zhing grong khyer au tsa ya na zhes bya ba na /
T01D1113:47a-13: dur khrod chen po yod par lha'i tshogs ma lus
T01D1113:47a-14: pa'i mdun na gcer bus lag pa stong dang ldan
T01D1113:47a-15: par gar byas so zhes gtam du grags pa yin
T01D1113:47a-16: no // sun dha dang au pa sun dha zhes
T01D1113:47a-17: bya ba'i lha ma yin spun gnyis ni lha rnams
T01D1113:47a-18: kyi dgra bo ser ba lta bur gyur pa yin
T01D1113:47a-19: no // la / de gsad par bya ba'i phyir
T01D1113:47a-20: thig le'i mchog ma zhes bya ba lha'i bu mo
T01D1113:47a-21: lha rnams kyi rang gi gzi byin gyi cha shas
T01D1113:47a-23: de phyag 'tshal ba na tshangs pas mthong bas des
T01D1113:47a-24: de'i gzugs kyis sems phrogs pas phyogs bzhir gdong bzhi
T01D1113:47a-25: sprul cing / steng du yang mgrin pa dang bcas pa'i mgo sprul la /
T01D1113:47a-26: des kyang lha chen po gang las byung ba'i rigs shes pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-27: lha chen po 'dis kho bo gang las byung ba'i rigs kyi gtam smras na /
T01D1113:47a-28: lha rnams kyi mdun du ngo tsha bar 'gyur ro snyam nas /
T01D1113:47a-29: des sen mos bcad par gyur to zhes grag go //
T01D1113:47a-30: de bram ze bcom zhing gnod pa byas pas gtses par gyur pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-31: lha rnams las mi'i mgo bo'i thod pa 'chang zhing dur khrod na gnas pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-32: ro bsregs pa'i thal bas bskus pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-33: glang po'i pags pa rlon pa gyon pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-34: nyin re zhing thun mtshams su mchod pa byed pa dang /
T01D1113:47a-35: nyin re zhing yang lha dang 'byung po'i mdun du
T01D1113:47a-36: gar byed pa la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs blangs par
T01D1113:47a-38: des na mi'i thod pa dang 'brel ba'i rgyan shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i phreng bas brgyan cing /
T01D1113:47a-39: bzhag par gyur pa yin pas na de skad ces bya'o //
T01D1113:47a-40: gcig tu zhi ba ni mchog tu zhi ba'o //
T01D1113:47b-0: spyod pa'i phul du byung ba ni sku la @47b
T01D1113:47b-1: sogs pa'i phrin las dri ma med cing skyon dang
T01D1113:47b-2: bral ba gang la mnga' ba ste /
T01D1113:47b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las shin tu yongs
T01D1113:47b-5: su dag pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T01D1113:47b-7: de lta bas na 'di ltar nye bar zhi ba'i
T01D1113:47b-8: spyod pa dang ldan pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T01D1113:47b-9: 'das te / de yang ji skad du /
T01D1113:47b-10: bcom ldan 'dod chags bral nyid du //
T01D1113:47b-11: khyed kyi sku nyid ston pa yin //
T01D1113:47b-12: khong stong nang na me gnas pa'i //
T01D1113:47b-13: shing las myu gu sngo mi 'byung //
T01D1113:47b-18: lha chen po la sogs pa smyon pa'i spyod pa lta bu dang ldan zhing /
T01D1113:47b-19: ma zhi ba de la mchod par bya ba de khyed nyid la dri bar bya'o //
T01D1113:47b-20: ci lha 'di dag la smad par bya ba de mtshon cha thogs pa tsam mam /
T01D1113:47b-21: gar la sogs pa byed pa tsam 'ba' zhig la smod par byed dam zhe na /
T01D1113:47b-23: khyab 'jug gis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
T01D1113:47b-24: de yang khyab 'jug gis ni 'thab dka' zhes bya
T01D1113:47b-25: ba la sogs pa'i rigs rgyud brlag par gyur pa
T01D1113:47b-26: yin te / 'di ltar khyab 'jug gis 'thab dka' la dris pa /
T01D1113:47b-27: dpung gi tshogs bco brgyad khyer ram /
T01D1113:47b-28: 'on te nor lha gcig pu khyer zhes dris pa dang /
T01D1113:47b-29: des dpung gi tshogs rnams khyer ro zhes smras pa dang /
T01D1113:47b-31: khyab 'jug gis skya bseng gi phyogs byas te /
T01D1113:47b-33: srid sgrub kyis kun du bltas te smras pa /
T01D1113:47b-34: kho bos ni nye du'i tshogs gsod par mi nus te /
T01D1113:47b-35: gang gi don du rgyal srid thob par 'dod pa'i
T01D1113:47b-36: nye du'i tshogs de ji ltar gsad par bya zhes
T01D1113:47b-37: smra ste / srid sgrub 'thab pa las ldog par gyur pa dang /
T01D1113:47b-39: khyed ni blun pa yin te /
T01D1113:47b-40: gang gis mi ni bsad pa dang //
T01D1113:47b-41: gang zhig gsod par byed pa dang //
T01D1113:47b-42: de dag gnyis ka mi dmigs te //
T01D1113:47b-43: bsad dang gsod pa po yod min //
T01D1113:47b-44: rigs dang 'dul ba phun sum tshogs //
T01D1113:47b-45: bram ze ba lang glang po dang //
T01D1113:47b-46: khyi dang sme sha can dag dang //
T01D1113:47b-47: mkhas pa rnams ni mnyam par blta //
T01D1113:47b-48: zhes bya ba la sogs pa med par lta ba'i tshigs su bcad pa mang po bstan cing /
T01D1113:48a-2: srid sgrub kyi kha lo pa rang nyid kyis byas te /
T01D1113:48a-3: g-yul bkye bas 'thab dka'i rigs dpung gi tshogs bco brgyad dang bcas pa brlag par gyur to //
T01D1113:48a-4: ru pa ti zhes bya ba'i rgyal po dpung gi tshogs gcig dang bcas pa g-yul 'gyed pa'i tshe /
T01D1113:48a-5: bud med kyi cha lugs su byas te bros nas
T01D1113:48a-6: ri kha ba can gyi ri khrod du zhugs te
T01D1113:48a-7: / gnas pa'i rigs las deng sang na yang bod ces bya bar grags pa yin no //
T01D1113:48a-8: dga' byed be'u phrogs te khros pas brtson par byed
T01D1113:48a-9: pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i lag pa stong bcad

T01D1113:48a-11: sa'i steng gi rgyal rigs med par byas nas ku
T01D1113:48a-12: ru kshe tra zhes bya bar kun nas dpag tshad
T01D1113:48a-13: lnga pa'i 'obs lnga brgya rgyal rigs kyi khrag gis
T01D1113:48a-14: de / bkang ste / pha mes shi ba la mtshun gtor byas so //
T01D1113:48a-15: ram pa zhes bya ba lha'i bu mo rgod ma'i gzugs su byas te nyin mo rgyu la /
T01D1113:48a-16: mtshan mo ni gzhu brgya ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal po dang nyal ba dang /
T01D1113:48a-17: gtam de thos nas khyab 'jug gis rgyal po de la rgod ma bslangs so //
T01D1113:48a-18: des 'jigs nas srid sgrub la skyabs byas pa dang /
T01D1113:48a-19: khyab 'jug dang srid sgrub shas cher g-yul bkye bar
T01D1113:48a-20: gyur pa na srid sgrub kyi mdas khyab 'jug gi
T01D1113:48a-21: lus la sha med par byas so //
T01D1113:48a-22: khyab 'jug gis ni srid sgrub kyi mgo 'khor los bcad de rgod ma phrogs so //
T01D1113:48a-23: de khyab 'jug gi lus dang reg pa dang /
T01D1113:48a-24: sngar rgod mar gyur pa'i drang srong gi dmod pa las thar te lha yul du song ngo //
T01D1113:48a-25: brgya byin 'ongs nas bdud rtsi blugs te rang gi bu srid sgrub gsos so //
T01D1113:48a-26: stobs ldan ni sgra sgrogs kyi zhang po yin pa las /
T01D1113:48a-27: 'ga' zhig gis sgra sgrogs la smras pa /
T01D1113:48a-28: gang gi phyir zhang po sa'i 'og tu bcings te
T01D1113:48a-29: 'dug na khyed kyi rgyal srid kyis ci zhig dgos
T01D1113:48a-31: sgra sgrogs pa ni sa gsum las rgyal bar byed
T01D1113:48a-32: pa yin no zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal gyi stobs
T01D1113:48a-33: dang / dpung chen pos stobs ldan thar par bya ba'i phyir sa 'og tu zhugs so //
T01D1113:48a-35: khyab 'jug 'jog po'i gdengs ka'i steng na nyal bar gyur pa na /
